Immigrant Dreams

  • L.A. Times
2023
Description

A series of 10 stories about immigrants in the U.S., in partnership with a landmark KFF poll. Newsroom-wide coverage including long-form articles, opinion pieces, how-to guides, interactive quizzes, comics, etc.

  • Created series branding and worked with art, data, home page, and social to maintain a cohesive look
  • Designed and helped build a quiz for readers with 13 selected poll questions
  • Freelancers illustrators and comic artists were immigrants or kids of immigrants

Tea: I wanted this project to be called Immigrant Lives. I fought for it not to be called American Dreams.

Collaborators

David Lauter, Alex Tatusian, Hanna Sender, Abhinanda Bhattacharyya, Jess Hutchinson, Patrick Hruby

Role

Lead Art Director, Graphic Design, Product Design, Project Management

Other Credits

See full project and credits i.e. reporters, photographers, translators etc.
